title: NFT Trading on Souffl3
description: Learn about Souffl3, a comprehensive NFT marketplace and launchpad on Aptos that allows users to mint, buy, sell, and trade NFTs with low fees and advanced features like collection offers and batch operations.

tasks.title: Prepare for NFT Marketplace
tasks.description: Add at least 0.1 APT to your wallet to begin exploring Souffl3

tasks.title: Souffl3 Basics
tasks.description: Understand what Souffl3 offers in the Aptos ecosystem
tasks.question: What is Souffl3's primary function in the Aptos ecosystem?
options: A decentralized exchange for token swaps
A lending and borrowing platform
An NFT marketplace and launchpad
A staking service for APT tokens

tasks.title: NFT Marketplace Features
tasks.description: Learn about the trading features on Souffl3
tasks.question: Which features does Souffl3 offer for NFT trading?
options: Only direct NFT purchases at fixed prices
Only auction-based sales
Multiple formats including fixed price, auctions, and collection offers
Only free NFT giveaways
tasks.correctAnswer: Multiple formats including fixed price, auctions, and collection offers

tasks.title: NFT Launchpad
tasks.question: What does the Souffl3 launchpad allow creators to do?
options: Only view existing NFT collections
Launch their own NFT collections with customizable minting parameters
Only trade established NFTs
Create fungible tokens but not NFTs
tasks.correctAnswer: Launch their own NFT collections with customizable minting parameters

tasks.title: Collection Offers
tasks.question: What is a 'collection offer' on Souffl3?
options: A discount offered by the platform
An offer to buy any NFT from a specific collection at a set price
A requirement to buy the entire collection
A feature only available to collection creators
tasks.correctAnswer: An offer to buy any NFT from a specific collection at a set price

tasks.title: NFT Royalties
tasks.question: How does Souffl3 handle creator royalties for NFT sales?
options: Royalties are not supported
Royalties are optional for buyers
Royalties are enforced on-chain according to creator specifications
Royalties are fixed at 10% for all collections
tasks.correctAnswer: Royalties are enforced on-chain according to creator specifications

tasks.title: NFT Rarity Tools
tasks.question: What rarity-related features might Souffl3 offer?
options: No rarity information is available
Rarity scores and rankings based on trait distribution
Only manual assessment of rarity
Rarity is determined solely by the price
tasks.correctAnswer: Rarity scores and rankings based on trait distribution

tasks.title: Marketplace Fees
tasks.question: How does Souffl3's fee structure typically work?
options: No fees are charged
A percentage fee on sales plus creator royalties
A fixed fee regardless of sale price
Buyers pay no fees, only sellers
tasks.correctAnswer: A percentage fee on sales plus creator royalties

tasks.title: Multi-Token Support
tasks.question: What tokens can typically be used for transactions on Souffl3?
options: Only APT
APT and selected other tokens on Aptos
Only Bitcoin
Any cryptocurrency from any blockchain
tasks.correctAnswer: APT and selected other tokens on Aptos

tasks.title: Batch Operations
tasks.question: What batch operations might Souffl3 support for NFT management?
options: No batch operations are supported
Only batch viewing of NFTs
Batch listing, buying, and transferring of multiple NFTs
Only batch operations for creators
tasks.correctAnswer: Batch listing, buying, and transferring of multiple NFTs
